item.title: Powershell
item.description: Poweershell PowerShell Core is a cross-platform (Windows, Linux, and macOS) automation and configuration tool/framework that works well with your existing tools and is optimized for dealing with structured data (e.g. JSON, CSV, XML, etc.), REST APIs, and object models. It includes a command-line shell, an associated scripting language and a framework for processing cmdlets. cmdlet get all cmdlet Get-Command Get-Command –Name *IP* Get-Command –Module ISE –Name *IP* Get-Help Get-Process Get-Member Get-Process | Where-Object {$_.
